issue.title: [R] value_counts and some StructArray methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11423](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11423). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Exposing value_counts() is useful for exploration, even if it is limited to counting over a single (non-struct) array. And since it returns a StructArray, I found it useful to implement some more methods on that object.
